\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{Mute()}{Mute()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void Member\+::\+Mute (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{int}]{time,  }\item[{JNIEnv $\ast$}]{env = {\ttfamily manager-\/$>$getEnv()} }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}

禁言当前对象，单位是秒，最少0秒最大30天 
\begin{DoxyExceptions}{异常}
{\em 可能抛出不同错误} & \\
\hline
\end{DoxyExceptions}
\begin{Desc}
\item[示例]\par
\mbox{\hyperlink{_d_1_2_git_2mirai_2_mirai_c_p_2cpp_2tools_8h-example}{D\+:/\+Git/mirai/\+Mirai\+CP/cpp/tools.\+h}}.\end{Desc}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{class_member_aba78f8099187033776154e6a3e60b881}\label{class_member_aba78f8099187033776154e6a3e60b881}} 
\index{Member@{Member}!uploadImg@{uploadImg}}
\index{uploadImg@{uploadImg}!Member@{Member}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{uploadImg()}{uploadImg()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \mbox{\hyperlink{class_image}{Image}} Member\+::upload\+Img (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const std\+::string \&}]{filename,  }\item[{JNIEnv $\ast$}]{env = {\ttfamily manager-\/$>$getEnv()} }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



上传本地图片，务必要用绝对路径 由于mirai要区分图片发送对象，所以使用本函数上传的图片只能发到群 

\begin{DoxyAttention}{注意}
最大支持图片大小为30\+MB 
\end{DoxyAttention}

\begin{DoxyExceptions}{异常}
{\em -\/可能抛出\+Upload\+Exception异常代表路径无效或大小大于30\+MB} & -\/可能抛出\+Member\+Exception找不到群或群成员 \\
\hline
\end{DoxyExceptions}
\begin{Desc}
\item[示例]\par
\mbox{\hyperlink{_d_1_2_git_2mirai_2_mirai_c_p_2cpp_2tools_8h-example}{D\+:/\+Git/mirai/\+Mirai\+CP/cpp/tools.\+h}}.\end{Desc}

\index{Member@{Member}!permission@{permission}}
\index{permission@{permission}!Member@{Member}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{permission}{permission}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily unsigned int Member\+::permission = 0}



权限等级 


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item OWNER群主 为 2
\item ADMINISTRATOR管理员 为 1
\item MEMBER群成员 为 0 \begin{DoxyNote}{注解}
上面那些变量在constants.\+h中有定义 
\end{DoxyNote}

\end{DoxyItemize}\begin{Desc}

\mbox{\hyperlink{_d_1_2_git_2mirai_2_mirai_c_p_2cpp_2tools_8h-example}{D\+:/\+Git/mirai/\+Mirai\+CP/cpp/tools.\+h}}.\end{Desc}
